mapper.insert: insert into bmc_account_strategy (accountUnusedDay, timeLimitPeriod, loginLimitNumber, lockTimeStrategy, accountLockTime) values(#{accountUnusedDay}, #{timeLimitPeriod}, #{loginLimitNumber}, #{lockTimeStrategy}, #{accountLockTime})
mapper.delete: update bmc_account_strategy set accountUnusedDay = #{accountUnusedDay}, timeLimitPeriod = #{timeLimitPeriod}, loginLimitNumber = #{loginLimitNumber}, lockTimeStrategy = #{lockTimeStrategy}, accountLockTime = #{accountLockTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, accountUnusedDay, timeLimitPeriod, loginLimitNumber, lockTimeStrategy, accountLockTime from bmc_account_strategy limit 1
